text: In Case of Emergency, Release Raptor is an action video game from developer Arcen Games. The game puts the player in charge of a velociraptor with the goal of causing destruction in a 3D environment. ==References== ==External links== * Official site Category:Action video games Category:2016 video games Category:Dinosaurs in video games Category:Linux games Category:MacOS games Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Windows games
title: In Case of Emergency, Release Raptor
